hero.name: Cruz Tang
hero.subtitle: Transforming enterprises through AI implementation Â· From managing 300+ international teams to building AI-first solutions

about.title: About Me
about.content:
I bridge the gap between large-scale operations and cutting-edge AI implementation. After managing 300+ team members at Topvan Group across China, Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam, I founded ThinkerCafe to democratize AI education and enterprise automation.

My unique background combines international team leadership, technical depth in AI/data science, and 10+ years of teaching experience. I don't just implement AI solutionsâ€”I build systems that empower people to work smarter.

Currently seeking opportunities to bring this combined expertise to enterprise AI consulting and digital transformation projects.

jobs.title: CEO & Founder
points: Leading distributed team across Taiwan and US developing AI education and automation products
Designed comprehensive AI curriculum (Personal OS, AI Communication, Visual/System Hacker series)
Built LINE Bot, automation systems, and AI-powered productivity tools
Delivering enterprise consulting on AI implementation and workflow optimization

jobs.title: Operations Manager
points: Directly led team of 10-12 people, indirectly managed 300+ members from China, Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam
Overseas assignments: Dubai Business Bay (4 months), Philippines Clark (1.5 years), Makati/BGC (1 year)
Enhanced data-driven decision-making using Python and Telegram Bot API
Managed all operations except finance and retail, reported directly to Chairman

jobs.title: R&D Manager
points: Team rebuilding: addressed 50%+ turnover, recruited new talent
Implemented Scrum development and testing environments
Developed operational anomaly reporting system with JIRA automation
Resolved iOS certificate and IP blocking issues

jobs.title: Data Science Lead
points: Built data science department from scratch
Established complete environment: Linux, Python, Docker, Jupyter, RStudio
Predicted player churn and implemented retention strategies
Detected arbitrage players and compiled quarterly reports

jobs.title: Founder
points: Vidol (SET TV): web series recommendation system
Chunghwa Telecom: big data Hadoop consulting
ITRI College: talent assessment & job data analysis

jobs.title: Big Data R&D Engineer
points: Designed data collection workflows and ETL engineering
Applied statistical methods for analysis and decision support
Disease Patient Dietary Semantic Analysis: built sentiment lexicon, developed scoring model, automated top 5 food recommendations per disease

projects.name: LINE Bot Booking System
projects.highlight: 48-hour delivery | Fully automated workflow | 95%+ customer satisfaction
projects.description: Built a complete LINE Bot-based booking system for a physical therapy clinic, reducing booking time by 70% and dramatically improving customer satisfaction. Integrated with Google Calendar for real-time availability.

projects.name: ThreadsBot Automation
projects.description: Developed an intelligent social media automation system using multiple AI agents working together. Achieved 3x increase in engagement rate and 80% reduction in manual operation time through automatic content analysis and scheduling.

projects.name: Personal OS Course
projects.tagline: Personal operating system course for the AI era
projects.description: Designed and delivered a comprehensive course series helping non-technical professionals build their own AI-powered personal operating systems. Students learn to leverage AI tools like Claude Code and MCP to automate workflows and enhance productivity.

lectures.title: Text Mining in Practice with R
Data Object, Object-oriented Programming and Coding Skills
Mining Facebook for Knowing a Person You Fancy
Data Mining for Finance with R: Machine Data Analytics
lectures.organization: Taiwan Academy of Banking and Finance

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: I don't chase "how many languages I know" â€” I chase "how fast I can solve problems." In the AI collaboration era, the focus isn't on hand-coding every line, but on: 1) Knowing what tool combinations to use 2) Designing maintainable system architectures 3) Making AI your development partner

layers.name: AI Collaboration Ecosystem
layers.description: Core competitive advantage in the AI-Native era

opening.title: The Biggest Bottleneck in Enterprise AI Transformation?
opening.subtitle: Not technologyâ€”it's execution speed and talent gaps.

valueProposition.title: Core Value Proposition
valueProposition.content: I deliver systems in 3-7 days using AI collaboration that traditional teams need 3 months to build.

items: iPAS AI Application Planning Specialist Certification Committee Member (ITRI)

projects.name: LINE Bot Booking System
projects.highlight: 48-hour delivery | Fully automated workflow | 95%+ customer satisfaction
projects.description: Built a complete LINE Bot-based booking system for a physical therapy clinic, reducing booking time by 70% and dramatically improving customer satisfaction. Integrated with Google Calendar for real-time availability.

projects.name: ThreadsBot Automation
projects.description: Developed an intelligent social media automation system using multiple AI agents working together. Achieved 3x increase in engagement rate and 80% reduction in manual operation time through automatic content analysis and scheduling.

projects.name: Personal OS Course
projects.tagline: Personal operating system course for the AI era
projects.description: Designed and delivered a comprehensive course series helping non-technical professionals build their own AI-powered personal operating systems. Students learn to leverage AI tools like Claude Code and MCP to automate workflows and enhance productivity.

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: I don't chase "how many languages I know" â€” I chase "how fast I can solve problems." In the AI collaboration era, the focus isn't on hand-coding every line, but on: 1) Knowing what tool combinations to use 2) Designing maintainable system architectures 3) Making AI your development partner

layers.name: AI Collaboration Ecosystem
